input: {{sentence: This is too heavy to carry}}; {{word: too}}
evaluation:
The task requires the chatbot to return just the part of speech tag for a given word within a sentence. The tags are specified in the chatbot description, such as CC, CD, DT, etc. In this output, the chatbot has returned the word "to" instead of one of the specified part of speech tags. Furthermore, the description instructs to return "Unknown" if the word cannot be tagged with the listed tags or "CantAnswer" if unable to tag the word at all, neither of which apply to returning the word itself. Therefore, this output does not comply with the requirement to provide only the specified part of speech tag.

ERR
